IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Simplified access to office spaces for start-ups through dedicated centres to reduce bureaucratic hurdles
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: The program emphasizes reducing administrative barriers for start-ups which are critical for economic growth and job creation in Dortmund

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Development of a digital platform to streamline city services and improve citizen-administration interaction
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: Digital transformation of public services is a key priority to enhance efficiency and accessibility for residents

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Equipping classrooms with digital tools and prioritizing digital literacy from early education
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: The program highlights technology as essential for future workforce readiness and educational equity

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Suspension of the 362 entertainment tax on dance events to boost cultural and creative sectors
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: This measure aims to support Dortmund's cultural economy and attract young people to the city

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Streamlining administrative processes to create a more business-friendly environment
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: The program directly addresses bureaucratic challenges faced by businesses which hinder innovation and growth

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Modernizing mobility solutions including digital taxi services and expanding cycling infrastructure
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: Improving transportation is vital for accessibility and sustainability while addressing youth mobility needs

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Promoting rooftop greening and renewable energy generation through urban planning
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: This aligns with climate goals and enhances urban livability through sustainable development

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Increasing city funding for accessible urban planning and infrastructure
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: Ensuring equal access for all residents is a core principle for inclusive city development

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Enhancing Dortmund's global image through museum marketing and international town twinning
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: Improving cultural visibility is seen as crucial for attracting talent and investment

IMPACT_POINTS.DESCRIPTION: Outsourcing and modernizing city services to improve efficiency and data security
IMPACT_POINTS.REASONING: Digital transformation of governance is essential for modernizing public services and reducing costs
